snippet.title: Cross Core Gameplay - Official Release Android iOS
snippet.description:
Cross Core Gameplay 交错战线 - Official Release Android iOS 
Cross Core Gameplay 
Cross Core 

Cross Core GAME 
"Cross Core" is a two-dimensional style mobile game with a mecha science fiction theme.

In the game, you will be the protagonist of the story, leading the team members to explore the unknown galaxy as the "captain" of the galaxy exploration team. During the exploration, you will encounter many enemies, meet like-minded partners, and face difficult choices amid many hardships.
I look forward to you, "Captain General", breaking through all obstacles, constantly exploring the unknown, and uncovering the truth behind the story step by step.

Cross Core Official Release CN: 

Total Size: 5,16 GB 
Game Download: 
Android: https://www.taptap.cn/app/176085
iOS: https://www.taptap.cn/app/176085 

SUBSCRIBE: @7LGAMEPLAY 

Follow me on: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/7lgameplay 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/7l_gameplay 

SUBSCRIBE for more videos 👌
Thanks for watching ✌️
